abstract: Christopher Grant "Chris" Wood (born 7 December 1991) is a New Zealand footballer who plays as a striker for Leicester City. Wood has been capped over thirty times for the New Zealand national team.
comment: Christopher Grant "Chris" Wood (born 7 December 1991) is a New Zealand footballer who plays as a striker for Leicester City. Wood has been capped over thirty times for the New Zealand national team.
